get.summary: Handles the otp-verification request.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: The OTP code

get.summary: Handles the request for sending a password reset verification code.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email address

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: The type of user

get.summary: Handles the request for resetting the password.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email address

parameters.name: otp
parameters.description: The OTP code

parameters.name: newPassword
parameters.description: The new password

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: The type of user

200.description: Password reset successfully or invalid verification code

put.summary: PUT request to update an existing brand's name.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the brand to be updated.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the brand.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove a brand by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the brand to be deleted.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

get.summary: GET request to retrieve items from the cart with a specified limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to retrieve from the cart.

400.description: Bad request if limit is missing

put.summary: PUT request to update the quantity of a product in the cart.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to update in the cart.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The new quantity of the product.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove a specific product from the cart.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to remove from the cart.

200.description: Success response after removing from cart

400.description: Bad request if productId is missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to clear all items in the cart.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve all consents for a specific user.
GET request to check if a user has consented to a specific policy type.

parameters.name: policyType
parameters.description: The type of policy to check.

400.description: Bad request if policyType is missing or invalid

post.summary: POST request to create a new order.

requestBody.description: The order data (product ID, quantity, etc.)

get.summary: GET request to fetch the list of orders by the current customer.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of orders to retrieve

get.summary: GET request to retrieve payment details by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The payment ID to retrieve.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

get.summary: GET request to retrieve all policies, optionally filtered by type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Optional filter by policy type (PRIVACY_POLICY, TERMS_CONDITIONS, etc.)

post.summary: POST request to create a new policy document.

requestBody.description: The details of the policy to create.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve the active policy of a specific type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The policy type (PRIVACY_POLICY, TERMS_CONDITIONS, etc.)

400.description: Bad request if type is invalid

get.summary: GET request to retrieve a specific policy by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the policy.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

put.summary: PUT request to update an existing policy document.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the policy to update.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

post.summary: POST request to deactivate a policy document.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the policy to deactivate.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

get.summary:
GET request to retrieve product details by product ID.
Accessible by customers, sellers, and admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the product

put.summary:
PUT request to update an existing product.
Accessible by sellers only.

delete.summary:
DELETE request to delete any product by ID (admin only).
Accessible by admins.

get.summary:
GET request to retrieve a list of products with optional filters.
Accessible by customers, sellers, and admins.

post.summary:
POST request to create a new product.
Accessible by sellers only.

get.summary:
GET request to search for products by name with optional filters.
Accessible by customers, sellers, and admins.

GET request to retrieve seller-specific products with filters.
Accessible by sellers.

post.summary:
POST request to upload a product image.
Accessible by sellers only.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve product categories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of categories to return.

400.description: Bad request if limit is missing

post.summary: POST request to create a new product category.

requestBody.description: The details of the category to create, including the category name.

put.summary: PUT request to update an existing product category by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the category to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the category.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove a product category by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the category to delete.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

get.summary: GET request to retrieve product subcategories by category ID.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The category ID to filter subcategories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of subcategories to retrieve.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

post.summary: POST request to create a new product subcategory.

requestBody.description: The details of the product subcategory to create.

put.summary: PUT request to update an existing product subcategory by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product subcategory to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the product subcategory.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to delete a product subcategory by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product subcategory to delete.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

get.summary: GET request to retrieve the profile of the current user.

200.description: A response containing the profile information of the user.

put.summary: PUT request to update the profile of the current user.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: The user's first name.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: The user's last name.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: The user's secondary mobile number.

parameters.name: faxNumber
parameters.description: The user's fax number.

parameters.name: streetAddress
parameters.description: The user's street address.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The user's city.

parameters.name: identificationType
parameters.description: The type of identification provided.

parameters.name: identificationNo
parameters.description: The identification number.

parameters.name: occupation
parameters.description: The user's occupation.

parameters.name: postCode
parameters.description: The user's postal code.

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: The user's gender.

200.description: A response indicating the success of the profile update.

post.summary: POST request to upload a new profile image for the user.

200.description: A response containing the file name of the uploaded image.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve reviews and ratings for a specific product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to get reviews and ratings.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of reviews to retrieve.

200.description: A response containing the list of reviews and ratings for the product.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

post.summary: POST request to add a new review and rating for a product.

requestBody.description: The body of the request containing review and rating details.

200.description: A response indicating the success of the operation.

put.summary: PUT request to update an existing review and rating.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the review to update.

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: The updated review content.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: The updated rating.

200.description: A response containing the updated review and rating.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove an existing review and rating.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the review to delete.

200.description: A response indicating the result of the deletion.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

post.summary: POST request to add shipping information for an order.

requestBody.description: The shipping details for the order.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve shipping information for a specific order.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order to retrieve shipping details.

400.description: Bad request if orderId is missing

put.summary: PUT request to update existing shipping information for an order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shipping record to update.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The updated order ID.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The updated shipping address.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The updated shipping city.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The updated shipping country.

parameters.name: shippingMethod
parameters.description: The updated shipping method.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The updated shipping phone number.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The updated shipping recipient email.

200.description: Success response with updated shipping info

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to delete a shipping record.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shipping record to delete.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

post.summary: POST request to create a new shop.

requestBody.description: The body of the request containing shop creation details.

200.description: A response containing the created shop details.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve a list of shops.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of shops to retrieve.

200.description: A response containing the list of shops.

400.description: Bad request if limit is missing

put.summary: PUT request to update the name of an existing shop.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shop to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name of the shop.

200.description: A response containing the updated shop details.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove an existing shop.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shop to delete.

200.description: A response indicating the result of the deletion.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

post.summary: POST request to create a new shop category.

requestBody.description: The name of the new shop category.

get.summary: GET request to retrieve a list of shop categories with a specified limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of shop categories to retrieve.

400.description: Bad request if limit is missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove a shop category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shop category to delete.

400.description: Bad request if id is missing

put.summary: PUT request to update the name of an existing shop category.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the shop category to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the shop category.

400.description: Bad request if required parameters are missing

post.summary: POST request to add a product to the user's wish list.

requestBody.description: The product to add to the wish list.

200.description: Success response after adding to wishlist

get.summary: GET request to retrieve the user's wish list.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of products to retrieve from the wish list.

400.description: Bad request if limit is missing

delete.summary: DELETE request to remove a product from the user's wish list.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to remove from the wish list.

200.description: Success response after removing from wishlist

400.description: Bad request if productId is missing
